E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 9/1/1982
Subject: Progress of Jeffrey Denney
Dear Sir,
Jeffrey Denney is doing pretty good at A Hana Rainbows!
He has an ERA of 3.60, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

He is day-to-day, but full recovery will take one week.
